raw: Tarlach MacNiallais, Who Fought for Gay and Disability Rights, Dies at 57 .
replaced: Tarlach MacNiallais, Who Fought for Gay and Disability Rights, Dies at 57 .

raw: This obituary is part of a series about people who have died in the coronavirus pandemic .
replaced: This obituary is part of a series about people who have died in the coronavirus .

raw: Read about others here .
replaced: Read about others here .

raw: The month of March began with a glorious Sunday morning , perfect for the St. Pat ’s For All Parade in Queens that celebrates diversity and equality as much as Irish heritage and culture .
replaced: The month of March began with a glorious Sunday morning , perfect for the St. Pat ’s For All Parade  Queens that celebrates diversity and equality as much as Irish heritage and culture .

raw: Among the organizers was the gregarious Tarlach MacNiallais , who had worked long and hard for inclusion of the long excluded .
replaced: Among the organizers was Mr. MacNiallais .

raw: He was known for his decades of advocacy for L.G.B.T. and disability rights .
replaced: Mr. MacNiallais was known for Mr. MacNiallais decades of advocacy for L.G.B.T. and disability rights .

raw: “ A battering ram on issues of importance , ” according to Harriet Golden , a vice president at A.H.R.C.
replaced: “ A battering ram on issues of importance , ” according to Harriet Golden , a vice president at A.H.R.C.

raw: New York City , an organization that serves people with intellectual and developmental disabilities , where Mr. MacNiallais worked for nearly 35 years .
replaced: New York  Mr. MacNiallais worked for nearly 35 years .

raw: Mr. MacNiallais died on April 1 .
replaced: Mr. MacNiallais died on April 1 .

raw: He was 57 .
replaced: Mr. MacNiallais was 57 .

raw: The cause was complications of the coronavirus , according to friends and family .
replaced: The cause was complications of the coronavirus , according to friends and family .

raw: He was born Terence Nellis in Belfast , Northern Ireland , on Oct. 9 , 1962 , the tenth of 11 children of John James Nellis , a bus conductor , and Una Nellis , a homemaker .
replaced: Mr. MacNiallais was born Terence Nellis in Belfast , Northern Ireland , on Oct. 9 , 1962 , the tenth of 11 children of John James Nellis , a bus conductor , and Una Nellis , a homemaker .

raw: He later adopted the Irish language version of his name , pronounced TAR - lock MACK - neel - ish .
replaced: Mr. MacNiallais later adopted the Irish language version of Mr. MacNiallais name , pronounced TAR - lock MACK - neel - ish .

raw: As a university student , he protested against British imperialism and emerged as a gay rights advocate .
replaced: As a university student , Mr. MacNiallais protested against British imperialism and emerged as a gay rights advocate .

raw: He responded to the “ Save Ulster From Sodomy ” campaign — an ultimately unsuccessful effort to keep homosexual acts illegal in Northern Ireland — by helping to mount a counter campaign with the slogan “ Save Sodomy From Ulster . ”
replaced: Mr. MacNiallais responded to the “ Save Ulster From Sodomy ” campaign — an ultimately unsuccessful effort to keep homosexual acts illegal in Northern Ireland — by helping to mount a counter campaign with the slogan “ Save Sodomy From Ulster . ”

raw: He moved to New York in the mid-1980s and became involved in the protracted struggle by L.G.B.T. groups to be fully included in the St. Patrick ’s Day Parade up Fifth Avenue .
replaced: Mr. MacNiallais moved to New York in the mid-1980s and became involved in the protracted struggle by L.G.B.T. groups to be fully included in the St. Patrick ’s Day Parade up Fifth Avenue .

raw: Many years later , he became a member of the New York City St. Patrick ’s Day Parade formation committee , and marched in the parade with the Lavender and Green Alliance in 2016 .
replaced: Many years later , Mr. MacNiallais became a member of the New York St. Patrick ’s Day Parade formation committee , and marched in the St. Patrick ’s Day Parade up Fifth Avenue with the Lavender and Green Alliance in 2016 .

raw: Brendan Fay , a friend and fellow activist , emphasized that Mr. MacNiallais ’s well - publicized activism for inclusive parades should not overshadow an equal passion .
replaced: Mr. Fay emphasized that Mr. MacNiallais ’s well - publicized activism for inclusive parades should not overshadow an equal passion .

raw: “ Most of his life in this city was advocating for people with disabilities , ” Mr. Fay said .
replaced: “ Most of Mr. MacNiallais life in New York was advocating for people with disabilities , ” Mr. Fay said .

raw: Mr. MacNiallais tested positive for the virus in mid - March and died at NewYork - Presbyterian / Weill Cornell Medical Center , with the texted words of loved ones being read to him by a nurse .
replaced: Mr. MacNiallais tested positive for the virus in mid - March and died at NewYork - Presbyterian / Weill Cornell Medical Center , with the texted words of loved ones being read to Mr. MacNiallais by a nurse .

raw: He is survived by his husband , Juan Nepomuceno , nine siblings and three stepchildren .
replaced: Mr. MacNiallais is survived by Mr. MacNiallais husband , Juan Nepomuceno , nine siblings and three stepchildren .

raw: On that March Sunday , the day the city ’s first case of coronavirus was confirmed , the St. Pat ’s For All Parade moved joyously through a corner of Queens before ending in the Woodside neighborhood , where organizers gathered for an after - party at the Saints Sinners Pub .
replaced: On that March Sunday , the day New York ’s first case of coronavirus was confirmed , the St. Pat ’s For All Parade moved joyously through a corner of Queens before ending in the Woodside neighborhood , where organizers gathered for an after - party at the Saints Sinners Pub .

raw: Amid the singing and drinking and cheering , the booming voice of Mr. MacNiallais was “ soaring above the lot of us , ” Mr. Fay recalled .
replaced: Amid the singing and drinking and cheering , the booming voice of Mr. MacNiallais was “ soaring above the lot of us , ” Mr. Fay recalled .

raw: Everything else , he said , “ seemed far away . ”
replaced: Everything else , Mr. Fay said , “ seemed far away . ”
